intension: Create a poster to promote a weekend discount on coffee at a cafe. The poster should feature black coffee and list the types of coffee included in the sale, such as espresso, americano, and long black. The discount is 20% off and the location is at 123 Anywhere St. in Any City. Include the website for more information: www.website.com
globalcaption: The image features a glass filled with a dark beverage, likely coffee, sitting on a wooden table. The glass is placed in the center of the table, and it appears to be the main focus of the scene. The table occupies most of the image, with the glass being the only object on it.
keywords: sale, discount, coffee, cafe, drink, beverage, black, instagram, post, insta, ig, tb
